records.question: Is Educative working on any other AI courses?
records.answer: Yes! Educative is actively developing a course on Agentic System Design, which teaches how to build AI agents that can plan, reason, and act using memory, tools, and retrieval. It's part of a broader AI initiative launching this year.

records.question: What is the MCP course on Educative?
records.answer: The MCP (Model Context Protocol) course explores how AI systems manage prompts, resources and tools efficiently when dealing with long-running conversations, complex tasks, and external tool use. It’s focused on designing protocols that help models stay grounded and relevant.

records.question: What is the LlamaStack course on Educative?
records.answer: LlamaStack is a hands-on course that walks learners through building a full-stack AI application using open-source models like Llama, vector search, and retrieval-augmented generation. It’s perfect for developers looking to go beyond the API.
